Hey folks, now that BF/CM is over I just wanted to pop a thread with what SmallWeb has to offer ending 2019 and starting 2020.

Firstly, [SmallWeb](http:// "SmallWeb") is now introducing DirectAdmin Email Services. This service runs through MXroute who I'm sure most of you are aware of and respect individually for their great service.

https://twitter.com/SmallWebHost/status/1204208123516522496

**What's the features?**

* **DirectAdmin Interface** - The email service uses a customised version of the DirectAdmin interface, removing unecessary web-related sections and opting for the "Sidebar" template for ease of use.


*  **300/H Outbound Limit** - Each individual email address can send a maximum of 300 outbound emails per hour. Of course, please only use this for legitimate, non-spam use. I'm sure you will. 


* **Reputable IP Addresses** - The provider is known for their quality  high reputation pool of IP addresses and strict anti-spam and anti-blacklist measures to ensure your emails are good to go.


* **The Necessary Protocols** - All necessary protocols are available such as IMAP, POP3 and SMTP.


* **Webmail Interface Login** - We offer a webmail interface using the Roundcube email software. It's recently been updated with a fresh design and looks very modern. We're looking into expanding this range.

**What's the package?**

SWMAIL - 3GB Storage - £9.99/year - Now £4.99/year - Promocode: BETA - [Order Link For 3GB Email Account](https://smallweb.net/portal/order/config/index/email/?group_id=31&pricing_id=599 "Order Link")
